item.title: Document Object Model
item.description: Document Object Model (DOM) Browsers view our webpages as documents Programming interface for HTML documents The DOM allows us to use a programming language (JavaScript) to make dynamic changes to our web pages Using JavaScript to dynamically change our web pages is also referred to as manipulating the DOM Example: Visual representation of the DOM In the image above, we have a html document on the left and a visual representation of this page’s DOM on the right
